CustomField.description: *If TRUE, this Detection Pattern will verify that detected credit card numbers are valid according to the Luhn Algorithm. *If you only want RegEx without credit card number validation (i.e. for a Social Security Number Pattern), then set this checkbox to false.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: *If TRUE, this Detection Pattern will verify that detected credit card numbers are valid according to the Luhn Algorithm. *If you only want RegEx without credit card number validation, then set this checkbox to false.
CustomField.label: LuhnCheck
